spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatch vs plan. Left zone in plan is Lounge/Dining with balcony; in the 3D render the left side appears subdivided differently and contains bedroom-like furnishing (bed), indicating incorrect room assignment/placement (E2/E5). The right-side bedroom wing exists but internal partitioning and corridor/door locations do not clearly match the 2D wall/door diagram (E2/E3). Window locations/counts do not align with the plan (notably missing/relocated openings for balcony/living and bedroom walls) (E2). Overall proportions/footprint differ from the compact plan plus detached garage; the render reads as a longer continuous volume (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness looks mostly consistent in the render, but fidelity to the plan’s structure is weak. Key adjacency relationships are not preserved (e.g., lounge/dining to balcony; kitchen/laundry/robe cluster; bath and separate WC arrangement) (E2). Required elements from plan are missing (detached garage; balcony; likely the distinct WC room) (E1). Additional/altered rooming is suggested by an apparent extra sleeping room on the left side not present in the plan (E5).

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not match the plan’s implied zoning: lounge/dining area appears furnished like a bedroom (E5/E2). Kitchen/dining placement is unclear relative to the 2D layout. Furniture scale is generally plausible, but mapping to the correct rooms is unreliable.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera is acceptable and the model is readable. However, the render is somewhat soft/blurred and lacks crisp edges, reducing clarity (E6). Lighting is neutral but flat. Geometry appears mostly clean with no severe mesh breaks, but composition does not clearly communicate the intended plan relationships.

detected_errors.description: Detached garage shown on the 2D plan is missing from the 3D render.
Balcony (off Lounge) present on the 2D plan is not clearly represented in the 3D render.
Lounge/Dining zone on the left of the 2D plan is not preserved; the 3D render shows different subdivision and bedroom-like use in that area.
Hallucinated bedroom/bed furniture appears in the left portion where the 2D plan specifies Lounge/Dining.
Kitchen/Laundry/Robe cluster placement and internal wall layout do not clearly match the 2D plan’s central-top configuration.
Bath and separate WC arrangement from the 2D plan is not clearly reproduced; partitions/locations appear different in the 3D render.
Interior door orientations/locations (notably around the bedroom wing and central hall) do not match the 2D door swings and placements.
Window placements/counts are inconsistent with the 2D plan, including missing/relocated openings corresponding to living/balcony side and bedroom walls.
Overall footprint/proportions differ: the 3D model reads as a longer continuous block rather than the plan’s compact unit plus separate garage.
Rendering softness/blur reduces edge definition and makes verification of doors/windows harder.
